# core-badge

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                                                                         | Type      | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `active` | `active`  | If `true`, the core-breadcrumb element is set to active.                                                                            | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `href`   | `href`    | Contains a URL or a URL fragment that the hyperlink points to. If this property is set, the nested anchor tag will receive the URL. | `string`  | `undefined` |
